thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Renée Robinson
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Renée Robinson

author: Renée Robinson
title: Renée Robinson
text:
Absolutely love riding my new bike from Reid! I haven't ridden a bike in two decades and felt like I was flying, it is so much fun to ride!
Luckily I have a friend who put my bike together, so it was hassle free for me. The only feedback I would give is that the colour (watermelon) was very pink compared to the more orange colour displayed online. If I purchased in store I would have chosen a different colour because I'm not a 'pink' girl, but it is growing on me:)
